name: Pitch Black (andymcgamer)
description:
Light your way through the darkness as you search for the sacred torch! Be careful though: if you take too much time, your flame will run out! 

Theme: Failure is Progress. 

With every death, you get to explore and reveal more and more of the level, hence making progress toward the goal at the end of each level. In order to progress, you must fail (unless you're just insanely good at being lucky haha). 

WASD/Arrow Keys to Move

R to Restart

Downloading might be more smooth.
